Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Minor
b) Defect Observed: Cargo hook release malfunction. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Contamination ingress through damaged seal assembly
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Door Mechanism component. Analysis of
operational data indicated parameter deviation.
c) Remedial Measures Adjust calibration settings to manufacturer specifications
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Implement condition-based monitoring system
d) Attributable Code: M - Other Reasons
Remarks: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Investigation findings reviewed. Root cause analysis is acceptable. Recommend implementation of proposed corrective actions.
